titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Luis A. Ferre.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
2/16/2007--Introduced.
Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend, and the Postmaster General to issue, a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Luis A. Ferre.
